main event: A round object was sighted for 40 minutes to 1 hour moving slowly towards the horizon and then disappearing, with the conclusion that it was Mars at the reported position.
interesting points: The object was observed from both ground and air visual perspectives.
It was initially similar to a bright star or aircraft light, observed at a low elevation and moving below the horizon over time.
Air Force pilots and control tower operators also witnessed the object while over Baltimore, Maryland.
One airline pilot reported sighting the object while over Richmond, Virginia.
Multiple reliable witnesses, including pilots and control tower operators, reported essentially the same thing, leading to the conclusion that all sightings were of the same object.
sighted object: round object resembling a bright star or aircraft light
witnesses: Military & Civilian eyewitnesses including Air Force pilots, control tower operators, and airline pilots
